input.sentences: since [female] 's favorite flower was the rose | she chose to have white roses in her wedding .
white roses graced her unity candle which sat on the altar .
one guest admired the stained glass windows while waiting for the wedding to start .
in addition to white roses | white candles served as decorations for the wedding .
guests gazed at the altar and all its decorations as they waited for the ceremony to start .
output.sentences: I smell one of the beautiful white roses as we set up for the wedding.
Some close friends and family have showed up already and have taken their seats in the pews.
We check to make sure there's adequate lighting for the wedding photographer.
Finally I take a step back to view the whole scene and it looks great.
